content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the traditional function of hiapo (tapa) ?

choices.label: It is worn by couples as part of courting rituals.
It is used as a form of currency in regional commerce.
It is designed and produced to decorate family altars.
It is given as a gift to demonstrate social relationships.
